name: Astro Hut
description:
Astro Hut is an action puzzle game about running a fast food service complex for a confederation of alien species. The player, an astronaut, must bring food to passerby aliens going through Astro Hut and try to make as much revenue as possible. 

Will Mr. Astronaut be able to handle the heat of hell’s kitchen in the deep emptiness of space and fill the stomachs of the confederation's compatriots with food and their hearts with love? Or will his efforts go up in flames, go bankrupt, and fade into the obscurity of empty space?
